title: Of racism and the ending thereof
author: VD
content_html:
Thus spake Amynda:

To see that Jew-killing is moral, you just need to look at Palestinian as human beings with lives that have value. When a Palestinian chooses to kill a Jew, he’s not indulging some guilty pleasure, like sneaking in a round of adultery at lunch, to bring up a genuinely immoral action that should not be criminal. He is probably thinking about his nation’s well-being and yes, his own well-being. Taking your own well-being into consideration is called “selfish” by Zionists, but I think valuing yourself is a moral good, even if you are Palestinian. In fact, especially if you are Palestinian, since you live in a world where having self-esteem can be an act of moral courage that requires some defiance. If I was Palestinian, I wouldn’t even have to suffer much mental strain to realize that killing a Jew would be the best choice for myself, my family, and my relationship. Jew-killing, not just the right to kill Zionists but the actual act, is a moral good that helps Palestinians and families and should be honored as such. Palestinians who kill Jews should be recognized as people who can accurately weigh their choices and make the most moral one.

Oh, I’m sorry, did I say Palestinians and Jews? I MEANT to say women and babies….

Amynda is a disgusting, morally perverted human being. Her national humiliation truly couldn’t have been more deserved. It’s just a pity we couldn’t see John Edwards giving this speech.

Just to explore the insanity of her position, I note that if abortion is a moral good, and racism is evil, (both positions publicly espoused by this walking, talking cancer on cankles), then the only logical solution is to end racism once and for all by forcibly aborting every Black, Mexican and Asian pregnancy.

While it’s hard not to think of the justice that would be served in jamming a sharpened Dyson extension into Amynda’s eye and sucking out what passes for her brain, I’m forced to remind myself that unlike her, I don’t believe in human and sub-human classes of homo sapiens; even evil feminist cretins possess God-given free will and freedom of speech. And by Amynda’s twisted “morality”, such a post-natal abortion would even be a morally positive act, since she also declares that “pleasure is a moral good”.

I wonder if Amynda realizes that she just declared rape to be a moral good? Probably not. Logic is hard!

In any event, I shall have to content myself with pointing out to all and sundry that yes, atheist monsters like this do actually exist, they do really believe that abomination is morality and they really will impose it upon you if given half the chance.

And never forget: CALLING A FEMINIST A FEMINAZI IS AN INSULT TO NATIONAL SOCIALISM!
